subject: [cc-community] Presentation on Copyleft for School Librarians...
body:
For those of you that are interested, I've posted the presentation on  
Copyleft at this site

http://commons.crios.info

The presentation is under an attribution license. Please feel free to  
critique me (be gentle) and let me know of any mistakes that I may  
have made.

Enjoy!
Christopher Rios

_______________________________________________
cc-community mailing list
cc-community@lists.ibiblio.org
http://lists.ibiblio.org/mailman/listinfo/cc-community
